data.title: Mysite 1
data.text:
Welcome to Emmazing Play!!

Emmazing Play, LLC is a family owned indoor play and birthday party center which is designed for children ages 3 months to 8 years old.

Our mission is to provide a safe, clean, spacious, colorful and fun place for family entertainment.

Our unique indoor facility has a large open floor plan that offers a 2 level playground structure that includes soft play items, climbers, slides, and tunnels. We also have ride on cars and coasters, and even an infant area designed just for the little ones.

​

Be sure to check out our Upcoming Events tab for special events for your child to enjoy.

Call or text 210-870-0246 to reserve your party today!!

● A signed release of liability and acknowledgment of rules is required for every

child that enters the facility.

● We are a sock only facility. Socks are required for ALL guests INLCUDING Adults. Socks available

for purchase for $5. During Open Play all children MUST wear OUR Emmazing Play grip socks.

● We are a parent/guardian supervised facility. Parents and guardians must remain

on the premises at all times.

● Emmazing Play, LLC does not provide daycare or supervision of children.

● Admission will not be granted for sick children, for the safety and well being of

others.

● No rough play, pushing or throwing of toys or items.

● Children must always be accompanied into the restrooms by an adult.

● Strollers are not allowed in the play areas.

● No outside food or drinks permitted with the exception of a reserved birthday

party package. Snacks and drinks are available for purchase at the front

counter.

● No alcoholic beverages allowed.

● All food and drinks must stay in the designated sitting and eating areas.

● No food or gum allowed in the play areas.

● Cake/cupcakes and presents may only be brought in if you have a reserved

private party.

● Adults are not permitted on any play structure.

● We are not responsible for lost or stolen property.

● Patrons not abiding by the rules will be asked to leave and no refunds will be

given.

● We have the right to refuse service to anyone.
